title: Muhtelif Mekan
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Pizza, International, Italian, Western, Mediterranean, Fusion, Middle Eastern, Spanish
description: A vegetarian restaurant, with a daily changing menu which includes plenty of vegan options.  Regular menu items include vegan desserts, salads, vegan soups, vegan balls (like fellah or falafel). Also has a small books and gift shop. Located in the Yeldegirmeni Quartier of Central Kadikoy. The access is either by m4 underground line Kadikoy station or by ferry from Besiktas-Eminonu-Karakoy (etc.) to Kadikoy pier. Friendly atmosphere for stray/pet animals.
